Package org.hotteam67.bluetoothserver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BluetoothServerActivity
    The subclass for the server activity, handles bluetooth input/output and communication with main thread
    PreferencesActivity
    Simple preferences activity, loads preferences from xml and saves them to shared preferences to be accessed in ServerActivity
    PreferencesActivity.SimplePreferences
    Preferences fragment with an editText that shows in the summary, for easier use
    SchemaActivity
    Activity for designing the schema, loads the current one, allows edits, and then saves it again
    ServerActivity
    Server activity, handles the connections to all of the devices and input
